items.title: Sudan army makes huge gains as it seeks to recapture war-torn capital
items.description: "Shrapnel and stray ammunition are falling on my neighbourhood," a doctor tells the BBC.

items.title: Hamas names next hostages to be released
items.description: The three civilians will be exchanged for more Palestinian prisoners in the latest swap on Saturday.

items.title: Alaska authorities search for missing small plane
items.description: The aircraft carrying 10 people was on flight from Unalakleet to Nome when "its position was lost".

items.title: Dozens of countries back International Criminal Court after Trump sanctions
items.description: A majority of member states, including the UK, Germany and France, said the court was "vital" for international justice.

items.title: Watch: Passenger train engulfed by flames in Pennsylvania
items.description: More than 300 people were safely evacuated after a fire started under the first car of the train.
